viewData.name: PhiBrows Fox SUP Pigment 10ml
viewData.short_description: SUP - the ┬áthird generation of world's best pigments for microblading, developed and produced by PhiAcademy.   -Learn more about SUP pigments┬á┬ápigments by clicking on the link below: http://www.phibrows.com/microblading-pigments    -See more about honey effect in our pigments┬áby clicking on the link below: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m_G6--lmsP0  We are happy to announce that the SUPE generation is coming out soon!
viewData.long_description: SUP - the ┬áthird generation of world's best pigments for microblading, manual technique. Use in the field of PMU (working with a PMU device) is also possible - to do this, the wanted PhiBrows pigment has to be mixed with┬áPhiThinner┬áin order to dilute it. As a mixing tool we recommend┬áPhiMixer.  -Learn more about SUP pigments by clicking on the link below: http://www.phibrows.com/microblading-pigments   -See more about Honey Effect in our pigments by clicking on the link below: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m_G6--lmsP0  We are happy to announce that the SUPE generation is coming out soon!
